page.title: 13THE PARISH HALL
page.content: There is a Parish Hall where people go to have fun. Near the Parish Hall they hold a Bonfire Night where everyone can have fun.There is also a Farm Park where you can see the animals and have pony rides and you can see the Farmer working. In Treburrick there is a Cricket Pitch where people can play when they want. You can also go pony-riding and bike-riding. {BALL GAMES}are quite popular as well.Games like Rounders and Cricket. Other games include Hopscotch and Skipping, Red Rover and Doctor, Doctor, Red Letter and Tig. {SPORTS GAMES}Netball, Football,Squash, Hockey and Matball
